title: Harry Potter Boys' Hogwarts T-Shirt Pack of 2
features: These tees will be your go-to tops whether you're studying in the common room or sneaking around the corridors after dark

A 2 pack of magical Harry Potter short sleeve tops one featuring a metallic gold print of the Hogwarts logo, and the other showcasing an all over motif of signature Hogwarts graphics such as lightning bolts, Harry's iconic glasses, and the Tri-Wizard Cup
Both tees are complete with a Harry Potter logo badge near the hem
description: Boys Harry Potter T-Shirts Pack of 2. Perfect for studying in the common room or sneaking around the corridors after dark, this cool 2 pack of t-shirts will have you covered! The dark grey top features a gold metallic print of the Hogwarts logo with 'Trained Wizard' below. The light grey tee showcases a fun all over motif of the Harry potter logo, lightning bolts, and the Hogwarts crest among other siganature Hogwarts graphics. Both complete with Harry Potter logo badges near the hem, these magical short sleeve tops will take you from the classroom to the forbidden forest!
